pensamentos.conteudo: Upside, inside out! She's living la vida loca!
We are the Champions, my friend. And we'll keep on fighting til' the end!
Imagine all the people, living life in peace.
Don't stop believin', hold on to that feelin'!
Cause you're a sky, cause you're a sky full of stars...
Hey Jude, don't make it bad. Take a sad song and make it better.
Ninguém sai com o coração sem sangrar ao tentar revê-la. Um ser maravilhoso. Entre a Serpente e a Estrela.
